# Overview

This application presents data from the Global Reservoir and Dam Database (GRanD Database) hosted at http://www.gwsp.org/products/grand-database/global-reservoir-and-dam-grand-database-project.html.  

"The recent version contains 6.862 spatially explicit records of reservoirs with their respected dams and gives information on their storage volume."

This application allows the user to explore selected aspects of the GRanD Database in the form of a bar chart and a map.

### Navigation

Click on any of the tab titles on the left to access the content described.  Click on the documentation tab for detailed instructions.
